attributes.action: Order the BBC to transmit its programmes in 4:3 aspect ratio without losing parts of the picture.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
TV viewers have no choice over whether they pay for the BBC via the licence fee which is authorised by your government.
Those with TVs with a 4:3 aspect ratio lose large portions if the picture (including text) at each side.
The BBC should be instructed to remedy this discrimiation against those with 4:3 aspect ratio TVs forthwith - by using a different channel for the different aspect ratio TVs if necessary!
